title: Excludes the value of trees for the purposes of real property tax assessments in certain counties
summary: Excludes the value of trees for the purposes of real property tax assessments in the counties of Allegany, Cattaraugus, Chautauqua, Chemung, Schuyler, Steuben and Yates.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          857

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  YOUNG  -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Local Government

       AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to excluding  the
         value of trees for the purposes of assessment in certain counties

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 305 of the real property  tax  law  is  amended  by
    2  adding a new subdivision 4 to read as follows:
    3    4.  IN  THE  COUNTIES  OF  ALLEGANY, CATTARAUGUS, CHAUTAUQUA, CHEMUNG,
    4  SCHUYLER, STEUBEN AND YATES, FOR PURPOSES OF REAL PROPERTY  TAX  ASSESS-
    5  MENT,  THE  VALUE OF TREES SHALL BE EXCLUDED FOR THE PURPOSES OF ASSESS-
    6  MENT.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately and  shall  be  deemed  to
    8  have been in full force and effect on and after January 1, 2011.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03402-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to excluding the value of trees for the purposes of assessment in certain counties
